title: Alam Ara (1973)  Xvid 2cd - Eng Subs - Jairaj, Nazima [DDR]
description:
Alam Ara (1973)  Xvid 2cd - Eng Subs - Jairaj, Nazima [DDR]

NO....THIS IS NOT 'ALAM ARA' of March 14th, 1932
After the fire at National Archives of India, Pune, in 2003, which destroyed the last surviving prints of several classics such as Raja Harishchandra and Achhut Kanya, this film is no longer available in its original format
NO....THIS IS NOT 'ALAM ARA' of 1956 either.
YES...THIS IS 'ALAM ARA 1973' 

CAST:-
Nazima
Jairaj
Ajit Sachdev
Mohan Chotti
Rajanibala
Hushnabanoo
W.M.Khan (Both Alam Ara 1956 & 1973)
Bindu

Directed by Nanubhoy Vakil (Both Alam Ara 1956 & 1973)
Music by Iqbal Qureshi
Lyrics by Kaifi Azmi and Hasrat Jaipuri
Playbacks:- Rafi, Suman Kalyanpur, Mahendra Kapoor, Krishna Kalle, Shankar & Shambu, Chandrani Mukherjee 

Songs are included in MP3s - Ripped from DVD (Bitrate 192kbps)

06. Yeh Meri Chadti Jawani
